title: Document usage of SystemInfoHandler at the node level
description:
http://localhost:8983/solr/admin/info/system gives us info about the node . It's useful for monitoring scripts to use some information from here. Currently it's not documented in the ref guide . 

 

Perhaps the best place would be a section under "Deployment and Operations" for best practices on monitoring a cluster.

comments.content:
Perhaps the best place would be a section under "Deployment and Operations" for best practices on monitoring a cluster.

But in SOLR-11411 you advocated for adding a new section "Monitoring Solr", which you did. Doesn't it seem it would muddy things to have monitoring in 2 places?
comments.author: Cassandra Targett

comments.content: Yeah for sure monitoring would be the better section for this.
